mapper.select: SELECT SAVE_CNT , CASE WHEN SAVE_HHCNT < 0 THEN EXP_USE_APPT_HOUR_CNT --WHEN WORK_TIME = 4 THEN FLOOR(SAVE_HHCNT/WORK_TIME)*WORK_TIME --ELSE FLOOR(SAVE_HHCNT/(WORK_TIME/2))*WORK_TIME/2 --2019.10.28 저축가능시간은 0.5일단위는 안됨 ELSE FLOOR(SAVE_HHCNT/WORK_TIME)*WORK_TIME END AS SAVE_HHCNT , STORE_YN FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN B.EMP_ID IS NULL AND C.EMP_ID IS NULL THEN TRUNC(TO_NUMBER(F_FRM_CODE_VALUE_C('01','PHM_POS_GRD_CD',POS_GRD_CD,SYSDATE,'X8'))/TO_NUMBER (F_FRM_CONST_VALUE_C ('01','DTM','DTM_BASE_HOUR',SYSDATE))*(#{savableRate}/100)) WHEN B.EMP_ID IS NULL AND C.EMP_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TRUNC(C.EXP_USE_APPT_DAY_CNT*(#{savableRate}/100)) ELSE B.EXP_USE_APPT_DAY_CNT END AS SAVE_CNT , CASE WHEN B.EMP_ID IS NULL AND C.EMP_ID IS NULL THEN TRUNC(TO_NUMBER(F_FRM_CODE_VALUE_C('01','PHM_POS_GRD_CD',POS_GRD_CD,SYSDATE,'X8'))*(#{savableRate}/100)) WHEN B.EMP_ID IS NULL AND C.EMP_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TRUNC(C.EXP_USE_APPT_HOUR_CNT*(#{savableRate}/100)) ELSE -1 END AS SAVE_HHCNT , B.EXP_USE_APPT_HOUR_CNT , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM DTM_HIS WHERE EMP_ID = A.EMP_ID AND STA_YMD BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')||'0101' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')||'1231' -- AND STAT_CD = '132' --and stat_cd not in ('111', '131', '141') and stat_cd not in ('111', '131') AND DTM_STORE_YN = '1') AS STORE_YN , F_DTM_WORK_TIME(A.EMP_ID, SYSDATE) AS WORK_TIME FROM PHM_EMP_C A LEFT OUTER JOIN DTM_SAVE_EXP B ON B.EMP_ID = A.EMP_ID AND B.YY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') --2019.08.08 연차촉진예외테이블도 참고 LEFT OUTER JOIN DTM_EXP C ON C.EMP_ID = A.EMP_ID AND C.YY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') AND EXP_TYPE = '1' WHERE A.EMP_ID = #{empId} )
